description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. With three stages of pure ball and paddle action, along with a bumping soundtrack by DJ Cutman, you'll be glued to your seat for hours! A graphical face lift and beautiful particle effects breathe new life into the genre that started it all!
